name: XWUI Toggle Group Component
description: Group of toggle buttons component for selecting one or multiple options. Displays buttons that can be toggled on/off. Supports single and multiple selection modes, various variants and sizes. Uses XWUIButton components internally.

conf_comp.title: Component Configuration (conf_comp)
conf_comp.description: Component-specific settings set when initializing the component

variant.description: Visual variant of the toggle buttons

multiple.description: Whether multiple items can be selected

className.description: Additional CSS class name for the toggle group

data.title: Component Data
data.description: Data to update the component, set when initializing the component

id.description: Unique identifier for the toggle item

label.description: Label text for the toggle item

icon.description: SVG icon HTML string for the toggle item

disabled.description: Whether the toggle item is disabled
